name: Bean Boys Fighting Schizo Meth
description:
Local Co-op, press any key on keyboard and controller to get in

Tutorial - Suck a tiktok video plum blossom ltd

Actual Tutorial - 

Q/Button East - Tighten/Loosen. Little Cube above player is purple when tight, blue when loose

Left Click/Button West - Attack, Can hold to do heavy. Your Right Hand becomes Blue when doing a Light Attack and becomes Red when doing Heavy Attack

Right Click/Button North - Throw, Can hold to throw for a further distance

Spacebar/Button South - Dodge, Can Dodge attacks and stones during mid-animation. No, I wont tell you the frame data.

Core Gameplay:

If Im Tight or Loose, my Throw depends. 

-Light Throw when Tight does little yoyo.

-Heavy Throw when Tight makes your rock carry you with it like a little surf.

-When throwing and Loose the rock just flies.

If I got my Stone or No Stone, my attacks and throws depend.

-Hold Throw when No Stone to recall your stone!

-Melee Attack Without Stone always loses to Any Melee Attack With Stone

-Heavy Melee Attack beats Light Melee Attack

-

SEX ORE WA SEXU SEX!!!!
